sen.j: 慶長5年（1600年）、関ヶ原の戦いでは西軍に与し、伏見城の戦いに参加し改易となり、その後の消息は不明。
sen.e: In the Battle of Sekigahara in 1600, he belonged to the West squad, and joined the battle of Fushimi-jo Castle, so that he forfeited his position and properties (Kaieki), and there was no further information about him since then.
